motto: A space for everyone to learn and share their knowledge about code and design.

main-page.main-title: Be a part of our events
main-page.main-description: Our events are done by the community, for the community. Without your support and participation there would be no us.
main-page.slack-description: Ask questions, get help from the community and stay up to date with the latest events.

speakers.call-to-action-description: We're looking for people who are willing to share their experiences with the community through talks. You don't have to be an expert in order to be a speaker!

moderator.call-to-action-description: We're looking for people with knowledge about a particular topic that are willing to moderate a discussion around that topic.

proposal.call-to-action-description: Interested in having a conversation about a particular topic, but don't feel you're the right fit to moderate or become a speaker? Send us your topic ideas any way, we'd love to see them!

feedback.call-to-action-description: We weren't kidding about loving the community. If you have anything to tell us, please use the form bellow. ❤️

podcast.section-description: Listen to the founders of Fullstack Nights geek out about technology and events in the tech world in a relaxed environment.

about.title: About FSN
about.text: Fullstack Nights is a monthly meetup where programmers and designers can share their experience and knowledge in an informal environment.
about.what-is-fsn-answer: Fullstack Nights is a monthly meetup for technologist and designers interested in learning and sharing their knowledge in an informal and relaxed environment.
about.what-is-the-format-question: What's the format of our event?
about.what-is-the-format-answer-line-1: Great question! We actually have two events: FSN Speakers and FSN Topic Tables.
about.what-is-the-format-answer-line-2: FSN Speakers is an event that consists of two 20 minute talks, an open mic session, and some networking time. Past topics have ranged from introductions to programming frameworks to user experience in event design.
about.what-is-the-format-answer-line-3: FSN Topic Tables aims to bring the community together to share conversations about different topics. Participants can ask questions, discuss ideas and expand their knowledge through a moderated conversation.
about.who-should-attend-question: Who should attend to this event?
about.who-should-attend-answer: Everyone who's interested in technology and interactive design. It doesn't matter if you're a student, an expert or if you just have a bit of curiosity about a topic. There's space for everyone to learn and share their experience.
about.why-are-we-doing-this-answer-line-1: The simple answer is: we ❤️ community. From the start, our goal has been to provide value and bring together the different communities working around tech and startups. From our point of view, sharing our experiences across disciplines makes the overall community stronger.
about.why-are-we-doing-this-answer-line-2: We also wanted to meet people and provide a safe place where people can network and grow. We hope you'll join us in this journey.
about.how-can-i-get-involved-answer: There's a number of ways. You can become a speaker or topic table moderator, you can propose a topic, or you can join our Slack community.
about.code-of-conduct-description: Every Fullstack Nights participant has to accept our code of conduct. The organizers of the event will enforce the meetup rules through out the event. We expect that every participant and organizer will help provide a safe environment for everyone.

404.text: You just hit a route that doesn't exist... the sadness.
